channel.title: Need help with choosing a random item

item.title: Need help with choosing a random item
item.dc:creator: @barcacl2006 barcacl2006
item.description:
@barcacl2006 wrote:

} else if (useItemID == 758 && atObjectID == 4126) // reward { sendMessage( "Well done, you have just finished your mini game, here's your reward :)"); deleteItem(758, getItemSlot(758), 1); addItem(15340, 1);

OK basically that code is just when you use the key on the chest, you lose the key and get a zammy hilt.
How do i make it so there are two options to choose from and the server randomly chooses one of them.

Say for example if you used the key with the chest. I wanted it so that the reward u get is one of many possibilities.
Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with choosing a random item
